name: Dracotail Shaurus
description:
1 "Dracotail" monster + 1 monster in the hand
You can target 2 "Dracotail" cards in your GY, and 1 face-up card on the field of the same type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) as 1 of them; shuffle all 3 into the Deck. If 2 or more monsters are sent to the GY at the same time, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Dracotail Shaurus" once per turn.
